channel.title: cv on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in cv on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: How I recruit – Why tool requirements are stupid
item.description: Hello folks! Today I would like to write about something very interesting I’m seeing all over the place from recruiters. And that is tool requirements from developers. For words So why is it a problem that in a requirement from a developer there a lots of these: – DB2 – QTP – Ranorex – Eclipse ( yes I saw a few of these… ) – Hibernate – Grails – Ruby on Rails
